title: UCLA vs. Michigan - Elite Eight NCAA tournament extended highlights
author: March Madness
description:
UCLA kept their cinderella run alive with a dramatic win over Michigan in the Elite Eight. Johnny Juzang's 28 points helped to make the Bruins just the second team ever to go from the First Four to the Final Four. Watch the extended highlights here.

Watch highlights, game recaps, and much more from the 2021 NCAA Division I Men’s Basketball Tournament on the official NCAA March Madness YouTube channel. Subscribe now to be updated on the latest videos: http://www.youtube.com/marchmadness?sub_confirmation=1

localize.description:
加州大学洛杉矶分校在八强赛中戏剧性地战胜了密歇根大学，让他们的灰姑娘之旅得以延续。而在这一过程中，朱赞的28分帮助布鲁斯队成为史上第二支从前四名进入四强的球队。在这里观看延伸的亮点。

localize.description:
加州大學洛杉磯分校在八強賽中戲劇性地戰勝了密歇根大學，讓他們的灰姑娘之旅得以延續。而在這一過程中，朱讚的28分幫助布魯斯隊成爲史上第二支從前四名進入四強的球隊。在這裏觀看延伸的亮點。
